docs.snippet: The sudden outbreak of a frontier dispute between Ecuador and Peru reads alarmingly, but in reality there is reason for satisfaction that it has at last come into the open and is being handled with customary efficiency and dispatch by the Council of...
docs.lead_paragraph: The sudden outbreak of a frontier dispute between Ecuador and Peru reads alarmingly, but in reality there is reason for satisfaction that it has at last come into the open and is being handled with customary efficiency and dispatch by the Council of the Organization of American States. The incident may now finally lead to the solution of a petty quarrel that has been an irritation for 125 years.
docs.abstract: ed lauds fast action of conciliatory machinery

docs.snippet: In your editorial of Aug. 13 you seem to distinguish between a responsible and an irresponsible opposition to Peron. But since nothing is said about the character of the latter or the influence of the former one can still wonder if you may not be...
docs.lead_paragraph: In your editorial of Aug. 13 you seem to distinguish between a responsible and an irresponsible opposition to Peron. But since nothing is said about the character of the latter or the influence of the former one can still wonder if you may not be lending support, unwittingly, to policies which run contrary to the very things for which your paper stands.
